Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: A client receiver for multicast traffic from a single source, also known as Source Specific Multicast (SSM).

span.span: A client receiver for multicast traffic from a single source, also known as Source Specific Multicast (SSM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须知道的多播的组地址和发件人源地址。The multicast group address and sender source address must be known. 除了从特定的发件人，接收多播的数据客户端还可以返回到发件人发送单播数据。In addition to receiving multicast data from a specific sender, the client can also send unicast data back to the sender. 若要从多个源接收多播或源不事先已知的当使用类。To receive multicast from multiple sources, or when the sources aren't known in advance, use the class instead.

summary.span: Creates a new UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from a single source.

span.span: Creates a new UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from a single source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将 UDP 多播套接字的组地址和端口，与相关联，但不会绑定或以其他方式使用套接字。The constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket. `groupAddress`参数可能是 IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. 但是的地址族`sourceAddress`和`groupAddress`参数必须相同。However, the address family of the `sourceAddress` and `groupAddress` parameters must the same. `localPort`参数必须指定一个端口小于 1024。The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.

exception.span: and must be the same address family.

span.span: and must be the same address family.

summary.span: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.

span.span: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 UDP 多播套接字绑定到的本地端口和联接多播的组以允许从单个源地址收到的数据报。The method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address. 中指定的多播的组地址、 单个源地址和要绑定到的本地端口构造函数。The multicast group address, single source address, and local port to bind to are specified in the constructor. 中指定的方法`callback`要加入多播的组的操作已完成时调用参数。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed. 如果所需的运行时，方法还会执行策略检查以验证客户端是否允许访问多播的组。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果客户端不允许访问，引发与。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with .

exception.span: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.

span.span: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.

exception.span: The has been disposed.

span.span: The has been disposed.

exception.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始从来自单个发件人已联接的多播组接收 UDP 数据包的操作。The method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from a single sender. 中指定的本地端口、 多播的组和发件人源地址构造函数。The local port, multicast group, and sender source address are specified in the constructor. 多播客户端必须具有已完成加入多播组。The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group. 中指定的方法`callback`收到数据包时，将调用参数。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 它可具有套接字失败，如果接收操作失败同步，虽然这是使用 UDP 不常见。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果发生套接字失败，引发。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的错误指定的成员为枚举。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class and the underlying the .

span.span: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class and the underlying the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReceiveBufferSize`属性获取或设置大小，以字节为单位的接收缓冲区的基础用于对此的多播的接收操作实例。The `ReceiveBufferSize` property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying used for multicast receive operations on this instance. 具体而言，`ReceiveBufferSize`属性控制当数据包到达，但尚未调用应用程序时，堆栈所使用的缓冲区的大小方法。Specifically, the `ReceiveBufferSize` property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the method. 如果此缓冲区被填满和应用程序调用之前不断涌现数据包和方法，旧的数据包将被丢弃。If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the and methods, old packets will get dropped. 应用程序永远无法接收旧的数据包，并在它调用时将收到较新的数据包方法。The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the method. 在 Windows 上的接收缓冲区的默认大小为 8192。The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192.

exception.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

exception.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

exception.span: The has been disposed.

span.span: The has been disposed.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the used for multicast send operations on this instance.

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the used for multicast send operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SendBufferSize 属性获取或设置大小，以字节为单位的发送缓冲区的基础用于对此的多播的发送操作实例。The SendBufferSize property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying used for multicast send operations on this instance. 在 Mac OS X属性控制字节数可能处于网络堆栈发送等待缓冲区之前对其他调用方法启动失败。On Mac OS X, the property controls how many bytes can be in the network stack's waiting-to-be-sent buffer before additional calls to the method start failing. Mac OS X 上的应用程序可能需要加以注意此属性，如果它们在短时间范围内发送大量的 UDP 数据包。Applications on Mac OS X may need to be concerned with this property if they are sending a large number of UDP packets in a short timeframe. 在 Windows 上，调用方法将采用更长时间才能调用根据的值的回调属性，如果发送缓冲区已满。On Windows, calls to the method will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the property if the send buffer is full. 属性仅控制是否用户的缓冲区保持在物理内存中锁定，直到发送完成。The property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes. 在 Windows 上的发送缓冲区的默认大小为 8192。The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192.

exception.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

exception.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.

exception.span: The has been disposed.
